books.title: The Happiness Advantage
books.author: Shawn Achor
books.description: The book that changed how I prioritize everything in my life. I aim to be happier and healthier so I can be more productive. Only when I am happiness can I bring more into the world.

books.title: Lean Startup
books.author: Eric Ries
books.description: A startup fundamental, The book that changed how I think about building. Building is about learning and validating hypotheses.

books.title: The Innovator's Dilemma
books.author: Clayton M. Christensen
books.description: A classic business book. Christensen asserts that incumbents chase higher and higher revenues, ignoring the needs of emerging markets. Messing with the status quo means cannibalizing profits, thus startups are best positioned to disrupt the market.
